title: AJK polls: Farrukh condemns attack on PTI rally
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 15 (APP):Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Thursday condemned the attack on Pakistan Tahreek-e- Insaf (PTI) ministers Ali Amin Khan Gandapur and Murad Saeed by unknown persons during an election rally in Hattian Bala, Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK).
In a tweet, the State Minister accused Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) leader Raja Farooq Haider and its supporters for creating political unrest in the territory.
The PML-N has resorted to traditional hooliganism and ‘gullu craysi’ due to fear of defeat in the upcoming elections of AJK, he added.
